page.title: 13SCHOOL MEALS
page.content: I, Mrs. C. Land, cook for 29 children, 2 teachers, 1 dinner supervisor and myself. We have such meals as:_ Fish fingers, chips & peas; Fruit Yoghurt. Hot dogs, cobs & salad; Jam sponge & Custard. Roast pork, roast potatoes, stuffing, cabbage; Mousse. The children very rarely leave anything. They all ask for their favourite sweet when it's their birthday. I save pictures off old cards, fasten a cocktail stick to the bottom and stick it in their dessert. They call this their birthday flag. Favourite sweets are Chelsea & cream buns, Doughnuts, Choc Ice, Chocolate cake, Fruit crumble & Cornflake tart. Meals cost 45p per day including 1/3 pint milk. I'm allowed Â£37 per year for cleaning materials and Â£36 per year for light equipment.
